reviews.text: It would be a great station, if it weren’t for the rude, unhelpful, monosyllabic callous staff. The ticket machines are better help than they are.

I would like to say a huge thank you to Chris who helped me sort my ticket drama out so efficiently and pleasantly today. After my anxiety inducing experience with staff at Tring station he and all the other staff at MK were a breathe of fresh air. So thank you sincerely
Platform staff are rude and talk down to customers. On many occasions I have seen them talk to PAYING customers like dogs. Disgraceful.

reviews.author_name: Flybird Taxis Milton Keynes Airport Transfer
reviews.text: Maximum trying to maintain for excellent standard good customer service

Pathetic! Trains are always late terrible service had to wait for a train for 1 hour and a 30 mins because 3 trains were cancelled! Also a fast train was going past the platform and the was no announcement saying it's passing us and the were kids and a baby in the platform and the mum didn't have enough time to tell them to stand back!
